title: Something Smells Like Pee
description: Humorist/writer/sketch artist Blythe Jewell offers a quirky selection of humor poems and illustrations about everything from being a mom to finding hair in all the wrong places. Random, insane, potty-mouthed and sometimes sweet, it's a collection that will leave you laughing, crying and nodding in agreement... sometimes all at once.More than 60 titles include: - Hair in My A*% Crack- Lollipop In My Hair- Shut the F*!% Up About Twilight- Ugly Baby- On Our Periods Together- Neil Patrick Harris Gets the Paddle- Leave the F*!%ing Cat Alone- Has Anyone Seen My Glasses- I Can't Do Math... and many more.
author: Blythe E. Jewell
